translations: n.小女修道院院长；大女修道院副院长

phrs.translation: 小女修道院院长, 女修道副院长, 女修道院副院长
修女院长, 修女院院长

sentences.sentence: The prioress passed jean Valjean in review.
The prioress could do nothing; the archbishop had spoken.
sentences.translation: 院长无可奈何，大主教的话已经说出了口。

sentences.sentence: The sub-prioress was an old Spanish nun, Mother Cineres, who was almost blind.
sentences.translation: 副院长是个眼睛几乎瞎了的西班牙籍老修女，西内莱斯嬷嬷。
